column1: Carnimírië was one of the rowans of Fangorn Forest
column2: much beloved by the Ent Quickbeam. It was cut down by Orcs of Isengard
column3: arousing the anger of this impulsive Ent.

column2: J.R.R. Tolkien explained that carnemírie means "with adornment of red jewels" in High-elven (Quenya).  See also caran in the Appendix to The Silmarillion.
